page.title: 09ELDWICK&GILSTEAD GALA 1985
page.content: {Eldwick}has had a Gala Day for many years,with a{procession}through the village and a{Gala Queen}with some attendants.Money raised is for the village. Since 1983 both Eldwick and Gilstead together for the Gala. {There are events all week}like a Teddy Bears picnic,Disco,Pet Show,Fell Race and a Soccer Match.{Saturday is the {Gala Day.}We watched{floats}go down the village.The Gym Club were best with children dressed up as TV people} like Boss Hogg,A Team,Mr Men.On the field was the{fair,donkey-rides and {stalls.}You could eat candy floss and icecreams or hot dogs.We went on the {bouncy castle}then it was{races}and {the circus.}There was a horse,camel, a lady on a trapeze and clowns.Zoe and Bryn were on the trampoline.We went on the little train then sent a balloon off in the race.It was a great day.
